      • createDataSet

        public static org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset createDataSet(java.util.List<WeatherObservation> observations)
        Create a data set suitable for graphing using data obtained by loading all WeatherObservations for the specified WeatherStation.
        Parameters:
        observations - the source of weather data for this data set
        Returns:
        a data set containing the time series of weather observations

      • createChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createChart(WeatherStation station,
                                                     java.util.List<WeatherObservation> observations)
        Create a temperature chart which can be added to a graphical user interface.
        Parameters:
        station - the weather station this chart is based on
        observations - the observations to display
        Returns:
        a displayable ChartPanel
